name: Soolking
description: '''Abderraouf Deradji''' ({{langx|ar|عبد الرؤوف دراجي}}; born 10 December 1989), known professionally as '''Soolking''', is an [[Algerians|Algerian]] singer and rapper. He started his career under the pseudonym MC Sool until 2013 before adopting his new stage name. He incorporates [[reggae]], [[soul music|soul]], [[hip-hop]] and Algerian [[raï]] in his music.
